title: Proposal to Launch Community Activity Rewards
body:
**Discourse link:**
https://forum.rally.io/t/proposal-community-activity-rewards/98

**Summary/Abstract:**
Allocate 1,000 $RLY per live creator per day to Community Active Rewards and launch them on or shortly after 11/12, to be distributed weekly to participating communities.

**Motivation:**
Utilize allocated rewards to drive real usage and activity of Creator Coins, Brand Coins, and any other social token on Rally.

**Specifications**
Launch timeline: 
- Target launch: 11/12 12pm PT 

System Design: 
- Hourly calculations per community, comparing current $RLY backing each creator coin to previous 4 week hourly average. 
- At launch, each community will start with “0” for initial comparison.
- Take the square root of the difference between current hour and previous 4 week average. Sum all communities with a positive delta, and allocate the proportional contribution amount to each corresponding Creator Coin. 

Reward Distribution:
- Distribute the total amount allocated each hour, at the end of each week. Weekly rewards will end Sunday at 00:00 UTC. 
- Actual Distribution time will vary pending total number of participants.
- Rewards are distributed in the form of $RLY backing to that community's Creator Coin. 

User Interface:
- Each Creator Coin’s detail page will display current allocated rewards in $RLY. 
- Countdowns to the next reward allocation, and reward distribution will be displayed.
- APYs will be displayed and calculated each hour for previously allocated rewards during the current week reward cycle.

A **Yes** vote for this proposal would accomplish the following:
- Approve the Community Activity Rewards design
- Allocate 1,000 $RLY per live creator per day to Community Activity Rewards
- Approve the launch of the rewards live to the community on or after 11/12/2020
author: 0x3f10d56B53D488049768c62211C3DF7FB990DA21
